I'm also voting for the fall of Troy.

I guess I'll count the votes on Saturday, too, to bring us to a total 
of 4 votes so far.

2 for fall of Troy

2 for helmsdeep

BTW, barring a tie, if anybody tallies the votes Saturday morning 
before I do, feel free to announce the results.
